title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 88.2 - Submission of plan
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 88.2 - Submission of plan

State Regulations

An insurer proposing for any reason to cease to maintain its existing licensing status in this State shall, at least 45 days prior to such proposed action, submit to the Superintendent of Insurance, for his approval, a plan to protect the interests of the people of this State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
88.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
